title: The Postman always rings twice
creator_credit: ITC, Haworth Productions, Carey Wilson and Tay Garnett
brief_description: A beautiful woman involves her lover in a scheme to get rid of her much older husband. Lana Turner and John Garfield are excitingly partnered for a tense, even clinical drama of a crime of passion. Based on the novel by James M. Cain.
